titleStmt.title: A poem on the coronation of His Most Sacred Majesty, James the Second by the grace of God of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. and of his royal consort, our gracious Queen Mary / (attempted) by R. Phillips.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Millet for P. Brooksby,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
